import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Crear una exportación asíncrona"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/exports"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Crea una exportación asíncrona para recursos de alto volumen.
La respuesta retorna el estado inicial del proceso y un identificador para consultar su progreso.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["resource"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"Recurso a exportar","enum":["consent_actions","consent_commits"],"example":"consent_actions"},"output_format":{"type":"string","description":"Formato de salida. Actualmente sólo se soporta CSV.","enum":["csv"],"default":"csv","example":"csv"},"where":{"type":"string","description":"Filtros en formato JSON serializado","nullable":true,"example":"{\"kind\":{\"=\":\"grant\"}}"},"order_by":{"type":"string","description":"Campo y dirección de ordenamiento","nullable":true,"example":"created_at DESC"}},"title":"ExportInput"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"202":{"description":"Exportación encolada","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"export":{"x-tags":["Exports"],"type":"object","description":"Exportación asíncrona de recursos","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Identificador único de la exportación","example":"exp_1B2M2Y8AsgTpgAmY7PhCfg"},"resource_kind":{"type":"string","description":"Recurso exportado","enum":["consent_actions","consent_commits"],"example":"consent_actions"},"output_format":{"type":"string","description":"Formato de salida","enum":["csv"],"example":"csv"},"status":{"type":"string","description":"Estado actual de la exportación","enum":["pending","processing","completed","failed"],"example":"processing"},"records_count":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Número total de registros exportados cuando la exportación finaliza","example":1200},"error_message":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Mensaje de error cuando la exportación falla","example":"Export record limit exceeded. Maximum allowed is 100000 records"},"file_name":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Nombre del archivo generado","example":"consent-actions-2026-02-19.csv"},"download_url":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"URL firmada para descargar el archivo generado","example":"https://app.soyio.id/attachments/eyJfcmFpbHMiOnsibWVzc2FnZSI6IkJBaHBB"},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Fecha y hora de creación","example":"2026-02-19T15:30:00Z"},"completed_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"Fecha y hora de finalización","example":"2026-02-19T15:31:22Z"}},"title":"Export"}}}}}},"401":{"description":"Error de autenticación","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["type","title","status","detail"],"properties":{"type":{"type":"string","example":"authentication_error"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"Unauthorized"},"status":{"type":"integer","example":401},"detail":{"type":"string","example":"We could not authenticate your credentials. Please check the documentation at https://docs.soyio.id"}}}}}},"422":{"description":"Error de validación","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["type","title","status","errors"],"properties":{"type":{"type":"string","example":"validation_error"},"title":{"type":"string","example":"Validation error"},"status":{"type":"integer","example":422},"errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"ValidationError"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
